name: unyocorp
description: UnyoDusk is a dark, elegant VSCode theme inspired by the tranquility and subtle beauty of dusk. With a harmonious blend of warm and cool tones, this theme offers a perfect balance for both daytime and nighttime coding sessions. Highlighting with soft oranges and purples, UnyoDusk ensures a comfortable and immersive coding experience, reducing eye strain while maintaining visual appeal. Ideal for developers who seek both functionality and aesthetics, UnyoDusk transforms your workspace into a serene and productive environment.
